c2ad.name: stub
c2ad.description:
Run command templates against specified device(s). 
1. Interactive mode can be enabled by setting suppressSuccessMessage and/or suppressFailureMessage to true. 
2. This workflow will allow a retries if reattempt is set to true.
     a. if reattempt is true, need to specify the reattemptQuantity and reattemptWaitTime.
3. Standard output object added to this opensource prebuilt to aid in error-handling. 

Sample payload:
{
  "suppressSuccessMessage": false,
  "templateName": "NX-OS_6 - Upgrade - File Verification",
  "templateVariables": {
    "swFilename": "nxos.9.3.10.bin",
    "swVersion": "9.3(10)",
    "flashMemory": "bootflash:",
    "backupConfigFilename": "Itential-NX-OS-runningconfig-2024-09-28T013436.209Z.cfg",
    "backupConfigFilenameConfirm": "Itential-NX-OS-runningconfig-2024-09-28T013436.209Z.cfg",
    "ftpserver": "10.248.148.52",
    "ftpserverConfirm": "10.248.148.52",
    "vrf": "",
    "isZeroTouch": false
  },
  "devices": [
    "Itential-NX-OS"
  ],
  "reattempt": false,
  "reattemptWaitTime": 1,
  "reattemptQuantity": 1,
  "suppressFailureMessage": false
}
